channel.title: System update count down
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I have problems with my in-game command (::update <60>) ingame. When I typ it in it kicks me off the game..(without count down) I want a count down of 60 secs does anyone know more on how to fix this? :P I'm new at this stuff so any help would be great, thanks.
[I'm using an eclipse client/source PI I downloaded from a youtube vid]
-

item.title: System update count down
item.dc:creator: @framexile framexile
item.description:
@framexile wrote:

Hello, try using this

if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerRights == 3) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
If doesn’t work or erros, please post.

Read full topic
